title: PATREON BONUS EPISODE! Making A Murderer Season 2, Ep. 1 "Number 18"
description:
SURPRISE!

this week we wanted to do something we’ve never done before—give every member of the TCO fam access to one of our Patreon full bonus episodes. We decided that our take on "Making A Murderer" season 2, episode 1 would be a great example to share of what we’re doing over on the Patreon feed. Tick Tock, it's Zellner 0'Clock, you guys. 

[](https://www.patreon.com/TrueCrimeObsessed)

[**CLICK HERE TO JOIN THE PATREON FAM!**](https://www.patreon.com/TrueCrimeObsessed)

As a reminder, if you become a member of the Patreon Fam, you get instant access to over 50 full bonus episodes including our episode-by-episode coverage of **"The Jinx", "Serial", "The Staircase", and "Making a murderer."** you get a new full bonus episode every week, and we’re now offering a level where you can also get ad free versions of our regular episodes.

WE LOVE YOU OKAY BYE BYE!
